short_summary: Purchase of a subscription service for a one-year period with options for two additional one-year periods.
description: This is a solicitation for Subscription Agent Services. The contract is for a one-year period with options for two additional one-year periods. The service required is for the acquisition, delivery, management, and related support of subscriptions to publications of all types and in all media, including electronic content hosted remotely by a publisher and on-site printed material, as well as access to an Electronic Resource Management Platform. This procurement is for Fisheries and Oceans Canada.
full_summary:
### FP908-230007 - Subscription Agent Services 

**Tender Announcement**
#### Reference Information 
* Reference Number: WS4411264877-Doc4418111957
* Solicitation Number: WS4411264877
* Publication Date: January 29, 2024

#### Tender Details 
* Closing Date and Time: February 13, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* Amendment Number: 5 (amended from original solicitation)
* Amendment Date: February 12, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 15, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: December 31, 2024

#### Solicitation Information 
* Tender Type: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Trades Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Sections Involved: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) and Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Description of Requirement 
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), invites an offer to acquire Subscription Agent Services. This includes acquiring subscriptions to publications of all types and media, delivering, managing, and supporting these subscriptions, and allowing access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform.

#### Contract Period and Options 
The contract is expected to be one year from award date with two 1-year option periods.

#### Proposal Submission Requirements 
Due to the modifications, the requirement is a fully-priced and technically compliant bid based on the solicitation documentation. Submission must be done online through Ariba Discovery and the cross-reference must be included.

#### Attention to Proposer(s) 
Please note that this solicitation is being issued under a Supply Arrangement (SA) arrangement. The Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for the Supply Arrangement E60PI-23AGNT-B is incorporated by reference and forms part of the bid solicitation.

#### Contact Information 
Curran, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL 
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18647280?extsite=MTg2NDcyODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Attachment 
None

#### Note for Returners 
A formal writen response of intent to participate by email to Matthew Curran (matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc
